summary: This is an FBI Collected Item Log documenting the submission of derivative evidence from a Computer Analysis Response Team (CART) examination. It records the seizure of a 2TB hard drive containing verified forensic images, related to the Jeffrey Epstein death investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject (UNSUB) in a death investigation. The document is a log for evidence submission related to his case.

events.title: Seizure of Hard Drive Evidence
events.description: A Hitachi 2TB hard drive was collected, containing verified forensic E01 images (NYCO23589, NYCO23593, NYCO23594, NYCO23595).

events.title: Submission of CART Derivative Evidence
events.description: The FBI formally logged the submission of the seized hard drive as derivative evidence under case number 90A-NY-3151227.

keyFacts: The document is an FBI evidence log related to the Jeffrey Epstein death investigation (Case ID: 90A-NY-3151227).
A 2TB hard drive (S/N B9GMGTYF) was seized on August 21, 2019, containing verified forensic image files.
The evidence was designated as a 'Master Copy' and submitted by the Computer Analysis Response Team (CART) in New York.
The document is explicitly marked as containing neither FBI recommendations nor conclusions, and its distribution is restricted.
